accrueInterest(address).details: Updates borrow and supply indexes based on time elapsedMUST be called before any state-changing operation

addAsset(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Must be called before asset can be used

calculateUserHealthFactor(address).details: HF = (Total Collateral in USD  Liquidation Threshold) / Total Debt in USDHF < 1.0 means user can be liquidated

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: Allows users to borrow any available amount of assets without collateral,      as long as the amount + premium is returned within the same transaction

params.amount: The amount of the asset being flash-borrowed
params.asset: The address of the asset being flash-borrowed
params.params: Variadic packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information
params.receiverAddress: The address of the contract receiving the funds

getBorrowRate(address).details: Uses 2-slope model: gentle slope below optimal, steep slope above

getSupplyRate(address).details: Supply rate = Borrow rate * Utilization * (1 - Reserve Factor)

returns.availableBorrowsUSD: Available to borrow in USD (8 decimals)

params.receiveAToken: If true, receive aTokens instead of underlying
params.user: Address of the borrower to liquidate

addAsset(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Initialize an asset with default configuration

getBorrowRate(address).notice: Calculate current borrow APR for an asset

getSupplyRate(address).notice: Calculate current supply APR for an asset

getUserBalance(address,address).notice: Get user's supplied balance including accrued interest

getUserDebt(address,address).notice: Get user's borrowed amount including accrued interest

getUtilizationRate(address).notice: Get utilization rate for an asset

setInterestRateModel(address,uint256,uin.notice: Update interest rate model for an asset

setUserEMode(uint8).notice: Allow user to select E-Mode category
